text: Ale vony (povernuly unappreciative ta) kydav vyklyk: "Nash Lord, my ne dbayemo yakshcho Vy zbilʹshuyete vidstanʹ nashykh mandrivok (bez budʹ-yakykh stantsiy)." Vony takym chynom obrazyly yikhni vlasni dushi. Otzhe, my zrobyly yim istoriyu, ta rozihnaly yikh u mali spilʹnoty vsyudy zemlya. Tse musytʹ zabezpechyty uroky dlya tsykh khto steadfast, appreciative
